trans-unit.source: Represents the ADO.NET metadata runtime service component that provides support for retrieving metadata from various sources.

The <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkSpace> class provides a central runtime service component that you can use to interact with conceptual model metadata in the context of a given application.
For more information, see [Metadata Workspace](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/601aee56-3eda-4caa-9082-a01df76c5e84).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace"></xref> class using the specified paths and assemblies.
The paths to workspace metadata.
The names of assemblies used to construct workspace.
Clears all the metadata cache entries.
Creates an <xref href="System.Data.Common.EntitySql.EntitySqlParser"></xref> configured to use the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.DataSpace.CSpace"></xref> data space.
The created parser object.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbQueryCommandTree"></xref> bound to this metadata workspace based on the specified query expression.
A <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that defines the query.

A new <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbQueryCommandTree"></xref> with the specified expression as it's <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbQueryCommandTree.Query"></xref> property.
Returns a object that represents the that matches the type supplied by the parameter objectSpaceType.
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EnumlType"></xref> that supplies the type in the object space.
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StructuralType"></xref> object that represents the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType"></xref>.
If there is no matched type, this method returns null.
Returns a object that represents the that matches the type supplied by the parameter objectSpaceType.
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StructuralType"></xref> that supplies the type in the object space.
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StructuralType"></xref> object that represents the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType"></xref>.
If there is no matched type, this method returns null.
Returns an <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"></xref> object by using the specified entity container name and the data model.
The name of the entity container.
`true` to perform the case-insensitive search; otherwise, `false`.
The conceptual model on which the entity container is searched.
If there is no entity container, this method returns null; otherwise, it returns the first entity container.
Returns an <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"></xref> object by using the specified entity container name and the data model.
The name of the entity container.
The conceptual model on which the entity container is searched.
If there is no entity container, this method returns null; otherwise, it returns the first entity container.
Returns all the overloads of the functions by using the specified name, namespace name, and data model.
The name of the function.
The namespace of the function.
The conceptual model in which the functions are searched.
A collection of type <xref href="System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1"></xref> that contains all the functions that match the specified name in a given namespace and a data model.
Returns all the overloads of the functions by using the specified name, namespace name, and data model.
The name of the function.
The namespace of the function.
The conceptual model in which the functions are searched.
`true` to perform the case-insensitive search; otherwise, `false`.
A collection of type <xref href="System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1"></xref> that contains all the functions that match the specified name in a given namespace and a data model.
Returns an item by using the specified identity and the data model.
The identity of the item.
The conceptual model in which the item is searched.
The type returned by the method.
The item that matches the given identity in the specified data model.
Returns an item by using the specified identity and the data model.
The identity of the item.
`true` to perform the case-insensitive search; otherwise, `false`.
The conceptual model on which the item is searched.
The type returned by the method.
The item that matches the given identity in the specified data model.
Gets <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace"></xref> items.
The <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.DataSpace"></xref> from which to retrieve items.
The <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace"></xref> items.
Gets all the items in the specified data model.
The conceptual model for which the list of items is needed.
A collection of type <xref href="System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1"></xref> that contains all the items in the specified data model.
Gets all the items in the specified data model.
The conceptual model for which the list of items is needed.
The type returned by the method.
A collection of type <xref href="System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1"></xref> that contains all the items in the specified data model.
Returns a object that represents the object space type that matches the type supplied by the parameter edmSpaceType.
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EnumType"></xref> object that represents the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StructuralType"></xref> object that represents the Object space type.
If there is no matched type, this method returns null.
Returns a object that represents the object space type that matches the type supplied by the parameter edmSpaceType.
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StructuralType"></xref> object that represents the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StructuralType"></xref> object that represents the Object space type.
If there is no matched type, this method returns null.
Returns the list of primitive types in the specified data model.
The data model for which you need the list of primitive types.
A collection of type <xref href="System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1"></xref> that contains all the primitive types in the specified data model.

Returns members of a given <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntitySet"></xref>/<xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityType"></xref> for which original values are needed when modifying an entity.
An <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntitySet"></xref> belonging to the C-Space.
An <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityType"></xref> that participates in the given <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntitySet"></xref>.
`true` if entities may be updated partially; otherwise, `false`.
The <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmMember"></xref>s for which original value is required.
Gets original value members from an entity set and entity type.
The entity set from which to retrieve original values.
The entity type of which to retrieve original values.
The original value members from an entity set and entity type.
Returns an <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType"></xref> object by using the specified type name, namespace name, and data model.
The name of the type.
The namespace of the type.
The conceptual model on which the type is searched.
An <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType"></xref> object that represents the type that matches the given type name and the namespace name in the specified data model.
If there is no matched type, this method returns null.
Returns an <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType"></xref> object by using the specified type name, namespace name, and data model.
The name of the type.
The namespace of the type.
`true` to perform the case-insensitive search; otherwise, `false`.
The conceptual model on which the type is searched.
An <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType"></xref> object.
Loads metadata from the given assembly.
The assembly from which the metadata will be loaded.
Loads metadata from the given assembly.
The assembly from which the metadata will be loaded.
The delegate for logging the load messages.
Represents the maximum Entity Data Model (EDM) version supported by the Entity Framework runtime.
Registers the item collection with each associated data model.
The output parameter collection that needs to be filled up.
Returns a object via the out parameter edmSpaceType that represents the that matches the type supplied by the parameter objectSpaceType.
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StructuralType"></xref> object that represents the object space type.
When this method returns, contains a <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StructuralType"></xref> object that represents the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType"></xref>.
This parameter is passed uninitialized.
`true` if there is a type that matches the search criteria; otherwise, `false`.
Returns a object via the out parameter edmSpaceType that represents the that matches the type supplied by the parameter objectSpaceType.
A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EnumType"></xref> object that represents the object space type.
When this method returns, contains a <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EnumType"></xref> object that represents the <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType"></xref>.
This parameter is passed uninitialized.
`true` on success, `false` on failure.
Returns an <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"></xref> object by using the specified entity container name and the data model.
The name of the entity container.
The conceptual model on which the entity container is searched.
When this method returns, contains an <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"></xref> object.
If there is no entity container, this output parameter contains null; otherwise, it returns the first entity container.
This parameter is passed uninitialized.
`true` if there is an entity container that matches the search criteria; otherwise, `false`.
Returns an <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"></xref> object by using the specified entity container name and the data model.
The name of the entity container.
`true` to perform the case-insensitive search; otherwise, `false`.
The conceptual model on which the entity container is searched.
When this method returns, contains an <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"></xref> object.
If there is no entity container, this output parameter contains null; otherwise, it returns the first entity container.
This parameter is passed uninitialized.
`true` if there is an entity container that matches the search criteria; otherwise, `false`.
Returns an item by using the specified identity and the data model.
The conceptual model on which the item is searched.
The conceptual model on which the item is searched.
When this method returns, contains a <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.GlobalIem"></xref> object.
This parameter is passed uninitialized.
The type returned by the method.
`true` if there is an item that matches the search criteria; otherwise, `false`.
Returns an item by using the specified identity and the data model.
The conceptual model on which the item is searched.
`true` to perform the case-insensitive search; otherwise, `false`.
The conceptual model on which the item is searched.

This parameter is passed uninitialized.
The type returned by the method.
`true` if there is an item that matches the search criteria; otherwise, `false`.
Tests the retrieval of <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.DataSpace"></xref> from which to attempt retrieval of <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.MetadataWorkspace"></xref>.
When this method returns, contains the item collection.
This parameter is passed uninitialized.
`true` if the retrieval was successful; otherwise, `false`.
